comments.react-dom: used to attach react components to the dom
comments.react-redux: provides ability to use redux with react
comments.redux-thunk: provides ability to pass functions to redux for asynchronous uses
comments.redux-devtools-extension: using this removes the need for custom code looking for devtools extension in the app
comments.serve: static server being i'm not using a standard node server
comments.wt-cli: webtask.io cli for managing webtask endpoints
